casebody.data:
The AUTOMATIC TOY CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. BUDDY “L” MFG. CO., Inc., and Edwin J. Bettendorf and William E. Bettendorf, Doing Business as Copartners under the Firm Name and Style of Buddy “L” Company, Defendants-Appellees. No. 344. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 20, 1938. Carl E. Ring, of New York City, for appellant. Emery, Varney, Whittemore & Dix, of New York City (Merrill M. Blackburn, of Davenport, Iowa, and Lucius E. Varney, of New York City, of counsel), for appel-lees.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CPI ASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
